traits.name: Bloodied Fury
traits.description: While Bloodied, the boar has Advantage on melee attack rolls while it is Bloodied.

actions.name: Gore
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature and the boar moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) Piercing damage and has the Prone condition.
